briefTitle: Living Better With Advanced Breast Cancer: Feasibility Evaluation of an Online Supportive Intervention.
officialTitle: Living Better With Advanced Breast Cancer (LIBERATE) Phase II: Evaluating the Feasibility of a Supportive, Self-management Website in Women Living With Secondary Breast Cancer.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of participants with self-reported outcome data at 12 weeks.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adult females (aged 18 and over).
* Diagnosed with secondary (metastatic, stage IV) breast cancer.
* Access to the internet.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Exhibiting signs of overt psychopathology or cognitive dysfunction.
* Current involvement in other clinical trials involving completion of QoL or other patient reported outcome measures.
